<div class="c-course-list">
<h5 class="c-course-list__title">7 courses</h5>

<div class="c-course-list">
<h5 class="c-course-list__title">15 courses</h5>

<td class="c-table__data c-table__data--2 c-table__data--name"><button class="c-table__show-courses-button u-relative u-color-guardian-brand">
<svg class="c-icon c-icon--plus u-absolute u-center-vh" viewbox="0 0 8 8" width="8" height="8">

<div class="c-course-list">
<h5 class="c-course-list__title">15 courses</h5>
<ul class="c-course-list__list u-unstyled">
